summary: A comprehensive unit‑test suite that validates the GPT‑2 model implementations, covering configuration, weight initialization, various model heads (language modeling, sequence classification, token classification, question answering), attention mechanisms, past‑key handling, batch generation, gradient checkpointing, and loading from pretrained checkpoints.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability and performance of GPT‑2 based components used in production NLP pipelines, enabling reliable deployment and easier maintenance of language‑model applications.
